content.rendered:
• DOES NOT INCLUDE A TICKET. YOU MUST HAVE A TICKET TO THE SHOW TO PARTICIPATE IN ANY VIP UPGRADE PACKAGE.
  • EARLY ENTRY
  • GUARANTEED ON STAGE ACCESS FOR LAST SONG IN MARS’ SET
  • WATCH MARS SHOW FROM THE SIDE OF THE STAGE*
  • M&G WITH MARS
  • INDIVIDUAL PHOTO OP WITH MARS SHOT BY A PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHER**
  • PRE-SIGNED 2025 TOUR POSTER AUTOGRAPHED BY JARED AND SHANNON
  • EXCLUSIVE VIP MERCHANDISE WITH LAMINATE (NEW FOR 2025!)
  • PRE-DOORS TOUR MERCHANDISE SHOPPING OPPORTUNITY
  • ON SITE VIP CONCIERGE

* LOCATION MAY VARY BY VENUE
** PHOTO WILL BE EMAILED WITHIN 72 HOURS OF SHOW

 

Check-in time and location will be emailed out by Adventures In Wonderland 3-5 days prior to the day of the show. Please check your spam folder! This information will also be posted on thirtysecondstomars.com prior to the show. All sales are final. Click here for complete Terms & Conditions.

excerpt.rendered: DOES NOT INCLUDE A TICKET. YOU MUST HAVE A TICKET TO THE SHOW TO PARTICIPATE IN ANY VIP UPGRADE PACKAGE.
